entry.content:
Description

"Small Teams Managing Security at Scale" by: Andy Leeb

Small teams often don't have the resources or ability for managing security for their applications. This talk will describe how a small team implemented a security program which includes a bug bounty program and where we were able to extract the most value.

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
